name: Ball Runner - Falling balls
description:
Project #1-1
Ball Runner - Falling balls

Here is your long-last snack game!
Run from falling balls.
You should not hit by them!


-----------------------------------------------------
How To Play

1. Touch screen to change your ball direction
(OneTouch or TwoTouch / See more information on setting)

2. Once you hit by falling balls, you will die.

3. Get more coins and be smaller and be faster

4. Get a Special ball to go higher!

5. Survive as long as you can.
-----------------------------------------------------


Let this game on your snack game folder
and come play whenever you are boring.

We will keep updating our game
and make this more fun!
